metadata.title: Bering Sea Water Temperatures (1977-1989)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: Water temperature data were collected in the Bering Sea during MIZEX West, OCSEAP, and FOCI deployments, from 1977 to 1989.  These data are stored on 74 disk files (8.1 MB) at  the Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory in Seattle, Washington. NOAAServer Codes: [L 75 56 -160 -180] ; nodateline
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To collect and record water temperature data in the Bering Sea during MIZEX West, OCSEAP, and FOCI deployments, from 1977 to 1989.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Check with Contributor about how to obtain data.

Use constraints: Check with Contributor about how to obtain data.
